title: ‘AI bubble bursting may be India’s shot at global investment revival’
description: India may attract some foreign capital in the event of the “Artificial Intelligence bubble” , which is driving outperformance in AI company stocks in developed economies and some emerging economies, bursting, according to experts.
content:

title: Cooling investor sentiment toward India may be a contrarian positive signal
description: The concerns around India remain the same. Valuations are too high. There is no economic & earnings momentum. We have no artificial intelligence (AI) play or beneficiary

title: Verizon, AWS expand tie up with new fiber network to power AI applications
description: Verizon announced a deal with Amazon Web Services on Monday to build high-capacity fiber routes connecting AWS data centers, aiming to strengthen infrastructure for the next generation of artificial intelligence applications.
content:
The partnership underscores how cloud and telecom giants are racing to meet surging data and network demands from generative AI, which requires fast, secure and resilient connections to process massive workloads.

title: OpenAI Strikes $38 Billion Infrastructure Deal With Amazon AWS
description: ChatGPT-maker OpenAI signed a $38 billion deal Monday with Amazon's AWS cloud computing arm, as the artificial intelligence company continues on a major partnership spree that has also included Oracle, Broadcom, AMD and chip-making juggernaut Nvidia.

title: Trump says China, other countries can't have Nvidia's top AI chips
description: ARTIFICIAL intelligence (AI) giant Nvidia’s most advanced chips will be reserved for US companies and kept out of China and other countries, US President Donald Trump said.
content:

title: Bridgewater CIOs warn investors are underpricing risks to AI-fueled rally in S&P
description: Investors are overlooking mounting risks to the current market stability and the limits of the artificial intelligence boom, particularly in the United States, Bridgewater Associates' co-chief investment officers said in a note to clients on Monday.

title: ChatGPT owner OpenAI signs $38bn cloud computing deal with Amazon
description: The seven-year agreement will see OpenAI gain access to Nvidia graphics processors to train its artificial intelligence models.
content:
OpenAI has signed a $38bn (£29bn) contract with Amazon to access its cloud computing infrastructure, as the start-up continues its run of major partnerships to secure computing power.
